CustomField.defaultValue: IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "PGi"), "PGi", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "Modality"), "Modality", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "ReadyTalk"), "ReadyTalk", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "TalkPoint"), "TalkPoint", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "iMC"), "iMC", NULL)))))
CustomField.label: Record Type for Dupe Rules
